body:
i'm thankful for [this incredible essay](https://tinyletter.com/brainball/letters/and-that-s-how-i-choose-to-remember-it) about rilo kiley:

_what rilo kiley has done to my brain is good i can’t keep it to myself. i wish i could wrap every single person i both know and don’t know into this feeling, or give them a piece of it to build their own little universe with rilo kiley playing on a loop in the background, putting the things that they grieve behind glass, making it something to be observed, appreciated, learned from—making it, i guess, the art of a life._

i'm thankful when people don't keep [good things](https://open.spotify.com/track/1B7SCDviw3UgQ7xTXWh1qL) to themselves. 

_It's all of the good that won't come out of me_

_And how eventually, my mouth will just turn to dust_

_If I don't tell you quick_

_Standing here on this frozen lake_
